name: Shadowshifter
description:
Ahoy, this was made for the Ludum Dare 35, with the theme being Shapeshifting. I worked with a team on another game but missed actually building and programming so with what free time I had during the last 36 hours when not making models I spent on this.

Pretty simple, stay alive as long as you can, use shadow form to dodge shots and close the distance with ranged enemies.

Note: will update shortly with a UI fixed version

Have fun!
